body_html: Thanks for reporting this. I can reproduce this on the nightly build as well. Looks like grad might not support negative axes. We'll look into it. As you say the work around is to use non-negative axes for now.
body_text: Thanks for reporting this. I can reproduce this on the nightly build as well. Looks like grad might not support negative axes. We'll look into it. As you say the work around is to use non-negative axes for now.
body: Thanks for reporting this. I can reproduce this on the nightly build as well. Looks like grad might not support negative axes. We'll look into it. As you say the work around is to use non-negative axes for now.
